function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of personal identification with safety systems could breach privacy and security of health systems.","Impact":"Potential breach of privacy and security of health data.","Mitigation":"Implement strict access control and encryption measures to protect personal identification data.","Technologies":"Access control systems, encryption technology.","People":"Healthcare professionals, facilities, and isolation centers.","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, facilities, and data security experts."},{"Description":"Remote collection of COVID-19 pandemic data using blockchain records could pose privacy risks.","Impact":"Risk of compromising individual data privacy.","Mitigation":"Implement anonymization and encryption of data in blockchain records to protect privacy.","Technologies":"Blockchain, anonymization techniques, encryption technology.","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers, data analysts.","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, data security experts, and researchers."},{"Description":"Challenges of implementing blockchain technology in health systems could lead to security vulnerabilities.","Impact":"Increased risk of security breaches and data manipulation.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough security assessments and testing of blockchain implementation in health systems.","Technologies":"Security assessment tools, blockchain security protocols.","People":"IT specialists, data security experts, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"IT specialists, data security experts, and healthcare professionals."}]}
